content.rendered:
A few things…

  • Sally’s back after a weekend away – yay!
  • I’m back at work tomorrow – have to see how things go.
  • Rode 14.8 KM (9.2 miles) in the gym yesterday – does that count?

excerpt.rendered: A few things… Sally’s back after a weekend away – yay! I’m back at work tomorrow – have to see how things go. Rode 14.8 KM (9.2 miles) in the gym yesterday – does that count?
